metadata.title: Atlassian Jira Server and Data Center Authentication Bypass Vulnerability

affected.product: Atlassian Jira Server and Data Center

metadata.description: Atlassian Jira Server and Data Center less than 8.19.1 are vulnerable, which allow remote attacker who has had their access revoked from Jira Service Management to enable and disable Issue Collectors on Jira Service Management projects in the /secure/ViewCollectors endpoint. This issue allows an attacker to conduct an improper authentication vulnerability.

criterion.comment: Check for Jira Server and Data Center is less than 8.19.1 (32-bit)
Check for Jira Server and Data Center is less than 8.19.1 (64-bit)
Check for Jira Server and Data Center is less than 8.19.1 (HKEY_USERS)

extend_definition.comment: Atlassian Jira Server and Data Center is installed for Windows

metadata.title: Atlassian Jira Server and Data center broken access control vulnerability

metadata.description: Atlassian Jira Server and Data Center versions is prior to 8.6.0, 8.7.0 and before 8.13.12, 8.14.0 and before 8.20.1 are vulnerable, which allow authenticated yet non-administrator remote attackers to edit the File Replication settings in the ReplicationSettings!default.jspa endpoint. This issue allows an attacker to conduct an broken access control vulnerability .
